items.sentence: It isn't always about the money, is it, Tom?
You promised me that you'd take care of Tom.
I bet Tom won't go to Australia next summer.
Everybody thinks that Tom went to Australia.
Does Tom think he'll stay in Australia long?
Do you think Tom wants to live in Australia?
Do you think that Tom could be in Australia?
I try to watch the news at least once a day.
This isn't something that I'd planned to do.
Tom hasn't been eliminated as a suspect yet.
Tom wants his kids to go to private schools.
Have Tom and Mary both forgotten to do that?
I don't know if I'll be coming home tonight.
Tom and Mary were both laughing really hard.
The next ferry isn't until tomorrow morning.
Do you think that is really going to happen?
Most of the flowers in Tom's garden are red.
Have you ever seen a monkey playing a piano?
The boys get out of school tomorrow at noon.
It wouldn't be a good idea to tell Tom that.
